SEARCH
Module edu.rpi.cs.chat.chatapp
Package edu.rpi.cs.chat.chatapp

Class ChatWebSocketEndpoint

java.lang.Object
jakarta.websocket.Endpoint
edu.rpi.cs.chat.chatapp.ChatWebSocketEndpoint
public class ChatWebSocketEndpoint extends jakarta.websocket.Endpoint
Class which acts as a web socket endpoint for the chat application. Sends and receives messages to be displayed on the app.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ChatWebSocketEndpoint(URI endpointURI, ChatController window)
    Connects this web socket endpoint to the web socket server specified by endpointURI.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatWebSocketEndpoint

      public ChatWebSocketEndpoint(URI endpointURI, ChatController window)
      Connects this web socket endpoint to the web socket server specified by endpointURI.
      Parameters:
      endpointURI - web socket server URI for the chat server.
      window - the chatcontroller the endpoint is connected to

  • Method Details

    • onOpen

      public void onOpen(jakarta.websocket.Session userSession, jakarta.websocket.EndpointConfig endpointConfig)
      Callback hook for opening the connection. Connects the newly opened user session to this object.
      Specified by:
      onOpen in class jakarta.websocket.Endpoint
      Parameters:
      userSession - newly opened user session on the server.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(String message)
      Callback hook for receiving. This method will be invoked when a client receives a message.
      Parameters:
      message - Message received from the server.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Send a message to the websocket. Should be in json format.
      Parameters:
      message - JSON message to send, with information about message contents, message recipient, etc.

    • close

      public void close()
      Close websocket connection; for closing the app or logging out.

    • onClose

      public void onClose(jakarta.websocket.Session userSession, jakarta.websocket.CloseReason reason)
      Callback hook for closing the connection. Sets this object's session to null.
      Overrides:
      onClose in class jakarta.websocket.Endpoint
      Parameters:
      userSession - session which is being closed
      reason - reason for connection closing.
